scripts.test:debug: set BROWSER=chromium&& cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require cucumber.ts --require features/step-definitions/**/*.ts --tags "@debug"
scripts.smoke-test:report: npm run test:smoke-all-browsers; npm run report
scripts.smoke-test-local:report: npm run test:smoke-all-browsers & npm run report
scripts.regression-test:report: npm run test:regression-all-browsers; npm run report
scripts.regression-test-local:report: npm run test:regression-all-browsers & npm run report
